attributes.action: Allow British public to carry licenced firearms
attributes.additional_details:
Due to the greatly increased terrorist threat & deaths caused by same & also that our police force can no longer protect us from this threat.
We the British public demand the right to carry licenced firearms so as to protect ourselves & our loved ones.
attributes.background: Demand the the UK government allow the British public to carry licenced firearms

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

It is already possible to obtain a licence to carry firearms for particular specified purposes, such as shooting for sport or controlling deer populations, so we're not sure what else you'd like to happen. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking the UK Government or Parliament to introduce a licence to allow people to carry firearms for self-defence, if that's something you'd like to happen.
